body.name: Americaloc Ready ST4500 OBD GPS Tracker. Vehicle Tracker. Super Detailed Tracking. Advanced CAT M1 Technology. Detects Harsh Driving, Speeding, Ignition, Tampering, Motion. FCC Certified.

features: New Release. Americaloc GPS Tracker for Serious and Intensive tracking. FCC Certified. No wires needed. Just plug it into the OBD port. Compact and small device. Designed for vehicles, trucks, vans, etc. Smart reporting with super detailed tracking history with no extra cost. We include the super detailed tracking service with no hidden or extra fees. Compare and buy with confidence: This unit also detects harsh braking/acceleration/turning, speeding, ignition status, tampering, motion.

Why is Americaloc better than lower priced devices? longer battery life, detailed maps, super detailed tracking service, official apps, configurable text and email notifications on all events, not just on some of them. Others charge you more for more frequent location reporting. We don't. You will feel the difference. Dedicated customer support area, affordable service plans. Fast reply.

No contracts. No activation fees. No cancellation fees. Only pay for a plan when you need it. Affordable service plans with super detailed tracking included. Why Americaloc is different: Compare tracking intervals and service prices, not just the device price. We offer you the super detailed tracking plan already included at affordable rates. No surprise or extra fees.

Why this one? This model combines data from traveled distance, corner turns and time intervals to provide a very detailed and accurate tracking history. Now with super useful features that analyze data to create a visual map highlighting the most visited places. Email and text alerts: ignition/motion, speeding, entering or leaving zones, connection/disconnection, harsh driving.
Works in the USA, Canada and Mexico. It is the newest version with CAT M1 Technology. New: create and manage shareable device location links for your customers or family.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why choose Americaloc? It's not just about tracking; it's about advanced functionality and insightful analysis. Experience super-detailed tracking and alerts, visual reports, 3 years of historical data, and official apps. Benefit from fully configurable text and email notifications for all events, not just on some. Americaloc owns its GPS tracking and management platform and it is not just a white label reseller. More than 16 years of experience providing GPS tracking solutions for both individuals and companies of all sizes. This OBD tracker is versatile and designed to work seamlessly with a wide variety of vehicles. Whether you have a personal car, a family minivan, a delivery truck, or even a fleet of commercial vehicles, this device can effortlessly integrate with any vehicle equipped with an OBD II port. Most vehicles manufactured after 1996 come standard with this port, making the OBD tracker a compatible and convenient choice for virtually all modern automotive tracking needs.

Get updates every 30 seconds when in motion, after every quarter-mile, or at each corner turn for detailed tracking. If preferred, you can adjust this to updates every 10 seconds at no additional cost. Works on the most advanced IoT Networks (Internet of Things). Get text and e-mail alerts: speeding, ignition on/off, entering or leaving zones, unit connection/disconnection, harsh braking/acceleration/turns, tampering, motion, among others.

This vehicle tracker simply plugs into your vehicle's OBD II port. Install it in less than 3 seconds. Web, Android, and iOS App. Track from any computer, tablet, or phone. In the box: GPS tracker, sim card (installed), start guide. SIM Card and Data Plan Included. Ready to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable GPS going strong after 2 years of use
reviews.reviewText: Perfect GPS tracker to give me peace of mind when I got my kids a car to share. I know where the vehicle is and how it is being driven at all times with easy access from my phone. Has been working trouble free for the past 2 years plus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is by far the best I have tried.
reviews.reviewText: Works much better than expected. Accuracy is great. Timely reports. I have tried two others (Spot and Ameracrest). This is by far the best I have tried.Believe it or not, Tech Support has contacted me to ensure everything is OK. Not like others where you cannot get any support at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I have tried several others but this is the best. Great price. It works as advertised. No battery to worry about. Plug it into the OBD port and you all set. Very accurate with real time notifications. I have recommended this to friends and family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely perfect! Would recommend to anyone looking for a quality GPS tracker. I specifically love the many features, and how easy it is to navigate the menu. Last but not least is how accurate it is!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable tracking device that does the job and works perfectly!
reviews.reviewText: Tracking device works as described. Accuracy is perfect. Monthly price is affordable. Have had this for 5 months and works just fine! 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just works! No Issues! Don't waste your time with other brands.
reviews.reviewText: I have three ST4500 devices and they work great. Only time i remove them is when I take the vehicles in for service or maintenance. When i do that I swap for the AMERICALOC GL300 GPS Tracker MXW which is battery powered and I can place in the door compartment. Don't waste your time with knockoffs. Americaloc is the best out there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2021
reviews.reviewText: False event alerts almost every day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Great product. Works better than expected! I used the tech support for some questions and to do an adjustment and they were super fast on responding.
